info.name: Slack Tomorrow Dark (base16)
info.description: A dark theme based on the base16-tomorrow dark color palette and the Slack Night Mode style.
info.additionalInfo: A flat dark color scheme based off the base16-tomorrow dark color palette. Someday I'll add some more coloration here, but splitting up the selectors will be a lot of work. Set your Sidebar Theme to this, under Preferences: #282A2E,#282A2E,#373B41,#F0C674,#373B41,#E0E0E0,#B5BD68,#CC6666 Thanks to Chris Kempson for the base16 color palettes (http://chriskempson.github.io/base16/). Big thanks to user 263844, Jonathan la Cour, for creating the original Slack Night Mode, style 101971, off which this is functionally based (just the colors changed). Changelog 1.0 - Initially created. 1.1 - Updated for the newer version of slack with some basic cosmetic fixes. (2015/9/18) 1.2 - Updated for more breaking changes. Unreadable usernames and white backgrounds are gone. (2015/11/13) 1.3 - Updated again for another breaking hover-white change. (2015/11/19) 1.4 - Updated for new unread-on-date thing. (2015/11/30) 1.5 - Updated for new channel switcher changes, topic stuff, fullscreen modal, and a few other things. (2016/01/29) 2.0 - Big update based on the new slack-night-mode code, which allows theming, making updates to the core code easier. As a result, there have been a few notable changes to the style. 2.1 - Updated for recent changes. 2.2 - Updated for recent changes. (2016/6/28) 2.3 - Updated for recent changes. (2016/9/3) 2.4 - Updated for recent changes. (2016/9/16) 2.5 - Updated for recent changes. (2016/9/23) 2.6 - Updated for recent changes. (2016/9/30) 2.7 - Updated. (2017/1/26) 2.8 - Updated.
